original_text:
Break Bones
Break Bones è una video slot con 3 rulli, 3 righe e 17 linee di pagamento rilasciata da Hacksaw Gaming. Fai scrocchiare le ossa fino a 3.333 volte la tua scommessa giocando su desktop, tablet o dispositivo mobile da 0,10 a 100 crediti per giro. Grazie alla funzione casuale EchoSpins, potrai ricevere giri gratis e attivare un fantastico bonus! Scopri di più in questa recensione…
Gameplay e caratteristiche principali di Break Bones
Dal mood Urban Graffiti, la slot Break Bones di Hacksaw Gaming ha un set di rulli da 3 con 17 linee di pagamento fisse. Il tema è rappresentato molto bene con grafiche originali e un sottofondo musicale di musica elettronica.
Per iniziare il gioco, puoi scegliere da 10 a 1.000 round automatici, utilizzare le impostazioni avanzate e impostare la scommessa da un minimo di 0,1€ fino ad un massimo di 100€. L’RTP è del 96,22% con una volatilità media, quindi si tratta di una slot online adatta sia a giocatori esperti che a principianti.
Simboli e Tabella dei Pagamenti presenti in Break Bones
La slot ha una tabella dei pagamenti standard composta da simboli regolari e speciali. I simboli di valore inferiore sono rappresentati dai semi di carte AJ. I simboli ben pagati sono graffiti di diversi teschi in quattro colori: arancione, blu con occhi viola, verde e un teschio blu con sopra una forma geometrica verde.
L’ultimo teschio è il simbolo più costoso della tabella dei pagamenti standard. In quella extra è composta da 3 simboli:
1. Il Wild con la lettera “W” che sostituisce le icone sulle linee di pagamento;
2. Il simbolo Skeleton Hand Scatter che attiva la funzione respins;
3. Il simbolo Bones Game Scatter che attiva il Round Bonus.
Funzionalità Speciali attivabili nella slot gratis Break Bones
· Moltiplicatori Wild e Moltiplicatori Globali
Il simbolo Wild può apparire sul rullo come un normale Wild e come un Wild moltiplicatore. Può aumentare le tue vincite di 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, 10x, 25x, 50x o 100x. Quando appare sul rullo un vasto numero di jolly, verrà attivata la funzione Global Multiplier, che moltiplicherà le tue vincite;
· Funzione Echo Spins
Quando appare lo scatter Skeleton Hand insieme ad almeno 1 linea vincente, ti verranno assegnati da 1 a 5 EchoSpin. Il vantaggio di questa funzione è che riceverai una vincita a ogni respin, poiché i simboli e la loro posizione sul rullo sono identici a quelli che hanno attivato il round bonus;
· Bones Game (Gioco delle Ossa)
Questa è la famosa funzione di giri gratuiti. Quando sul rullo compaiono 3 scatter, ricevi automaticamente 10 giri gratuiti. Nel round bonus, puoi anche ottenere le funzionalità bonus precedenti, che possono aumentare significativamente le tue vincite;
· Buy Bonus
E infine, se non vuoi aspettare che gli scatter appaiano sul rullo e vuoi tentare subito la fortuna nel round bonus, puoi semplicemente acquistarlo per 80 volte la tua scommessa. Basta selezionare la giocata e cliccare sul pulsante “Acquista Bonus”.

Domande Frequenti 
Qual è la vincita massima della slot senza registrazione Break Bones?

La vincita massima è 3.333 volte la puntata iniziale. Puoi ottenere la vincita massima grazie alle funzionalità bonus del gioco, come il round Free Spins o la funzione Respin. Non dimenticare i Wild che aumentano le tue possibilità di ottenere combinazioni vincenti e i moltiplicatori che possono aumentare significativamente il tuo premio.



Posso acquistare il round bonus in The Break Bones?

Sì, puoi acquistare il round bonus; il suo valore è 80 volte la puntata.



Posso giocare a Break Bones gratuitamente?

Certo, giocare gratis alle slot del nostro catalogo non è mai un problema. Puoi semplicemente scegliere uno dei nostri casinò online più votati, cercare Break Bones e scegliere di giocare in modalità demo o richiedere il tuo bonus di benvenuto e farti strada verso le grandi vincite con soldi veri.

raw_translation.response:

With a maximum payout of up to 3,333 times your bet, you can crack some bones on desktop, tablet, or mobile devices with bets ranging from 0.10 to 100 credits per spin. With the random EchoSpins feature, you can receive free spins and activate an amazing bonus! Learn more in this review...

Gameplay and Key Features of Break Bones
With an Urban Graffiti mood, the Break Bones slot by Hacksaw Gaming has a set of 3 reels with 17 fixed paylines. The theme is well represented with original graphics and an electronic music background. To start the game, you can choose from 10 to 1,000 automatic spins, use advanced settings, and set your bet from a minimum of 0.1€ up to a maximum of 100€. The RTP is 96.22% with medium volatility, so it's a great online slot for both experienced players and beginners.

Symbols and Paytable in Break Bones
The slot has a standard paytable with regular and special symbols. Lower value symbols are represented by the AJ card suits, while the higher value symbols are graffiti of various skulls in four colors: orange, blue with purple eyes, green, and a blue skull with a green geometric shape on it. The last skull is the most expensive symbol in the standard paytable. The extra paytable consists of 3 symbols: 1. The Wild with the letter "W" that replaces icons on paylines; 2. The Skeleton Hand Scatter symbol that activates the respins feature; 3. The Bones Game Scatter symbol that activates the Bonus Round.

Special Features in the Free Break Bones Slot
· Wild Multipliers and Global Multipliers
The Wild symbol can appear on reels as a normal Wild and as a Wild multiplier. It can increase your winnings by 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, 10x, 25x, 50x, or 100x. When a large number of Wilds appear on reels, the Global Multiplier feature will be activated, multiplying your winnings.
· Echo Spins Feature
When the Skeleton Hand Scatter symbol appears along with at least 1 winning payline, you will be awarded 1 to 5 EchoSpins. The benefit of this feature is that you will receive a win on every respin, as the symbols and their position on the reels are identical to those that activated the bonus round.
· Bones Game (Free Spins)
This is the famous free spins feature. When 3 Scatters appear on reels, you automatically receive 10 free spins. In the bonus round, you can also get the previous bonus features, which can significantly increase your winnings.
· Buy Bonus
Finally, if you don't want to wait for Scatters to appear on reels and want to try your luck in the bonus round immediately, you can simply buy it for 80 times your bet. Just select the play and click on the "Buy Bonus" button.

FAQ
What is the maximum payout in the free Break Bones slot game?

The maximum payout is 3,333 times your initial bet. You can get the maximum payout thanks to the game's bonus features, such as the Free Spins round or the Respin feature. Don't forget the Wilds that increase your chances of getting winning combinations and the multipliers that can significantly increase your prize.

Can I buy the bonus round in Break Bones?

Yes, you can buy the bonus round; its value is 80 times your bet.

Can I play Break Bones for free?

Of course, playing free slots from our catalog is never a problem. You can simply choose one of our top-rated online casinos, search for Break Bones, and choose to play in demo mode or claim your welcome bonus and make your way to big winnings with real money.

You will be awarded 1 to 5 Echo Spins, and the position of the symbols on the reels will be identical to those that activated the bonus round. This means that you will receive a win on every respin.

Review: Break Bones is a video slot game with 3 reels, 3 rows, and 17 paylines released by Hacksaw Gaming. With a maximum payout of up to 3,333 times your bet, you can crack some bones on desktop, tablet, or mobile devices with bets ranging from 0.10 to 100 credits per spin. With the random EchoSpins feature, you can receive free spins and activate an amazing bonus! Learn more in this review...

Gameplay and Key Features of Break Bones
With an Urban Graffiti mood, the Break Bones slot by Hacksaw Gaming has a set of 3 reels with 17 fixed paylines. The theme is well represented with original graphics and an electronic music background. To start the game, you can choose from 10 to 1,000 automatic spins, use advanced settings, and set your bet from a minimum of 0.1€ up to a maximum of 100€. The RTP is 96.22% with medium volatility, so it's a great online slot for both experienced players and beginners.

Symbols and Paytable in Break Bones
The slot has a standard paytable with regular and special symbols. Lower value symbols are represented by the AJ card suits, while the higher value symbols are graffiti of various skulls in four colors: orange, blue with purple eyes, green, and a blue skull with a green geometric shape on it. The last skull is the most expensive symbol in the standard paytable. The extra paytable consists of 3 symbols: 1. The Wild with the letter "W" that replaces icons on paylines; 2. The Skeleton Hand Scatter symbol that activates the respins feature; 3. The Bones Game Scatter symbol that activates the Bonus Round.

Special Features in the Free Break Bones Slot
· Wild Multipliers and Global Multipliers
The Wild symbol can appear on reels as a normal Wild and as a Wild multiplier. It can increase your winnings by 2x, 3x, 4x, 5x, 10x, 25x, 50x, or 100x. When a large number of Wilds appear on reels, the Global Multiplier feature will be activated, multiplying your winnings.
· Echo Spins Feature
When the Skeleton Hand Scatter symbol appears along with at least 1 winning payline, you will be awarded 1 to 5 EchoSpins. The benefit of this feature is that you will receive a win on every respin, as the symbols and their position on the reels are identical to those that activated the bonus round.
· Bones Game (Free Spins)
This is the famous free spins feature. When 3 Scatters appear on reels, you automatically receive 10 free spins. In the bonus round, you can also get the previous bonus features, which can significantly increase your winnings.
· Buy Bonus
Finally, if you don't want to wait for Scatters to appear on reels and want to try your luck in the bonus round immediately, you can simply buy it for 80 times your bet. Just select the play and click on the "Buy Bonus" button.

FAQ
What is the maximum payout in the free Break Bones slot game?

The maximum payout is 3,333 times your initial bet. You can get the maximum payout thanks to the game's bonus features, such as the Free Spins round or the Respin feature. Don't forget the Wilds that increase your chances of getting winning combinations and the multipliers that can significantly increase your prize.

Can I buy the bonus round in Break Bones?

Yes, you can buy the bonus round; its value is 80 times your bet.

Can I play Break Bones for free?

Of course, playing free slots from our catalog is never a problem. You can simply choose one of our top-rated online casinos, search for Break Bones, and choose to play in demo mode or claim your welcome bonus and make your way to big winnings with real money.
